rationale: The segment discusses containment strategies but does not contain an intensifier or comparative modifying a risk-adjective.
statement_text: That [finding about transport/equipment spreading the virus] means that cutting the virus off at those points [of transport/equipment] can contain it [the virus], he [Deeble] said, noting that officials have not seen new introductions of the virus to dairy cows from birds since the outbreak started, likely late last year.
